activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: The wash'e'r is next to the engine.
Does this assembl'e'r always check the gearbox?
Does this  driv'e'r usually park the car outside?

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the capital cities to the nationalities.
රාජධානී නගර ජාතිකත්වයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
மாநகரங்களையும் தேசியத்துவங்களையும் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

tables: What kind of food does he cook?

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Indian dishes on Tuesday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Indian dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: She prepares Indian dishes on Monday.

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Thai dishes on Monday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Thai dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: He prepares Thai dishes on Tuesday.

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare German dishes on Thursday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare German dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: He prepares German dishes on Wednesday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare German dishes on Thursday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare German dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares German dishes on Wednesday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Swiss dishes on Saturday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Swiss dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares Swiss dishes on Friday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Sri Lankan dishes on Saturday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Sri Lankan dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares Sri Lankan dishes on Sunday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare French dishes on Wednesday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare French dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares French dishes on Thursday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Japanese dishes on Friday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Japanese dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares Japanese dishes on Saturday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Indian dishes on Friday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Indian dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares Indian dishes on Monday.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

examples.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a body repair technician?
options: He repairs dents and scratches on cars.
He makes dents and scratches on cars.
He calculates dents and scratches on cars.
examples.answer: He repairs dents and scratches on cars.

content.sentence: Is there a first aid kit in the room?
Are there safety helmets on the table?
Is there a fire extinguisher near the door?
Are there gloves in the drawer?
Is there a warning sign on the wall?
Are there reflective vests in the cupboard?
Is there a safety harness on the shelf?
Are there goggles in the box?
Is there a pair of boots under the bench?
Are there ear protectors in the bag?

activity_b.text: Is there a first aid kit in the room?  Yes, there is.
Are there safety helmets on the table? No, there aren’t.
Is there a fire extinguisher near the door?  No, there isn’t.
Are there any gloves in the drawer?  Yes, there are.
Is there a warning sign on the wall? No, there isn’t.
Are there any reflective vests in the cupboard?  Yes, there are.
Is there a safety harness on the shelf?  Yes, there is.
Are there any goggles in the box?  No, there aren’t.
Is there a pair of boots under the bench?  Yes, there is.
Are there any ear protectors in the bag? No, there aren’t.

activity_a.text:
Match the words to their definitions.
පදයන් ඔවුන්ගේ අර්ථයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
சொற்களை அவற்றின் வரையறைகளுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_b.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_c.text:
Listen.
கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

activity_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_e.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: What does Ramesh do at the beginning of his workday?
Questions.answer: He checks the job card and prepares the tools.
options: He checks the job card and prepares the tools.
He drives the cars to the paint shop.

Questions.question: What does he use to tighten the bolts on the wheel hub?
What does Ramesh do during every service?
Questions.answer: He tests the horn, wipers, and indicators.
options: He tests the horn, wipers, and indicators.

Questions.question: Where does he record the details of the service?
What does Ramesh do before leaving the workshop?
Questions.answer: He locks the toolbox and switches off the power.
options: He forgets to clean the area.
He leaves all the tools on the bench.
He locks the toolbox and switches off the power.

activity_c.text: My name is Kamal. I am a trainee at the Sri Lankan–German Training Institute.
I study the training modules in the morning and in the afternoon.
From Monday to Friday, I follow a routine with my classmates.
We start the training at eight o’clock.
In the morning, I meet my friends and we talk for a few minutes.
Then we go to the workshop.
I use different tools, and I practise with equipment.
Sometimes I measure materials, sometimes I check machines, and sometimes I observe simple experiments.
We listen to the instructor and we ask questions.
The teacher explains the lesson step by step.
Sometimes the instructor gives us a group project, and we must share our ideas and responsibilities.
We have a tea break from ten thirty to eleven o’clock.
We sit together, we drink tea, and we eat short eats.
After the break, I continue my work.
I read instructions, I do small projects and I write notes in my exercise book.
We often work in pairs or in groups.
I also use the computer to practise ICT skills.
When I practise on the computer, I learn new software that is useful for our future careers.
At noon we go for lunch.
In the afternoon, we learn safety rules, practise English sentences, and play a short learning game.
We do not sleep in class, and we do not waste time.
Sometimes the teacher asks us to present our work, and this helps us build confidence in speaking English.
At the end of the day, I clean my tools and I tidy the workshop.
Before we leave, we discuss the next day’s plan, so everyone knows what to prepare in advance.
We leave the institute at four fifteen.
